message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this exclusive product. I believe it will be a great fit for your needs. My initial offer is $2000000.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $800000. I believe this is a fair price considering my budget.
Thank you for your interest, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but the product holds significant value. How about we meet in the middle? I'm willing to offer it to you for $1600000.

Thank you for your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I appreciate your offer of $1600000, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1000000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and my budget.

I appreciate your continued interest, Bob. I understand the constraints you're working with, but I need to honor the value of this product. I can go down to $1400000. I hope this can work within your budget.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget and the value of the product, I'm willing to meet you at $1200000. This is my final offer, as I have another option available at this price point.
